snippet: A bipartisan group called No Labels, seeking to make the presidency more effective, has fashioned a blueprint that would add extra powers and accountability.
abstract: Washington Memo; No Labels, a bipartisan group of former advisers to presidents and would-be presidents, has drafted a plan to make the presidency more effective, with proposals that would make the office both more powerful and more accountable.
lead_paragraph: A bipartisan group called No Labels, seeking to make the presidency more effective, has fashioned a blueprint that would add extra powers and accountability.

headline.seo: ‘No Labels’ Group Offers Ideas for More Effective Presidency
headline.main: Unshackling the Presidency to Fix the Government
headline.print_headline: Unshackling the Presidency to Fix the Government
